Tswana.text: Bogadi ke eng mme bo ntshiwa jang?

English.text: What is bogadi and how is it paid?

Tswana.text: Patlo ya mosadi e dirwa jang?

English.text: How is a woman's hand in marriage asked for?

Tswana.text: Letsema ke eng, le bolodiwa ke mang mme le dirwa fa go rileng?

English.text: What is "letsema,"  (lit. "volutarily working together") who declares it and when is it done?

Tswana.text: Mabele a lemiwa jang le ko kae a le mantsi mo Botswana mme a bewa mo go eng fa a sena go robiwa?

English.text: How and where is sorghum planted in large quantities in Botswana and how is it stored?

Tswana.text: Mmino wa sekalaka wa dihosana ke eng mme go aparwa jang?

English.text: What is the Kalanga dance "Dihosana" and why is it performed?

Tswana.text: Mosadi yo o sa nyalwang ga a letlelelwe go tsena merero ya manyalo a setswana. Ke eng fa go ntse jalo?

English.text: The unmarried woman is not allowed to take part in traditonal tswana marital rites. Why is that so?

Tswana.text: Pharologanyo fa gare ga setlankana/lease le setlankana se sesha sa Secure Land Title se se fiwang ke Lekgotla la Kabo Ditsha ke eng?

English.text: What is the difference between a tribal land certificate/lease and the new Secure land Title which is issued by the Land Board?

Tswana.text: Molao wa Botswana wareng fa go tla mo go rueleng dipodi, dikgomo, ditonki le dinku mo motseng setoropo? Mabaka a molao ke eng?

English.text: What is the law regarding keeping herds of domestic animals like cows, donkeys, goats and sheep in township areas? What are the reasons behind that law?

Tswana.text: Dibini tsa borankana di rwala eng mo maotong mme se dirwa ka eng?

English.text: What do traditional dancers wear on their legs and how is it made?

Tswana.text: Go tewa jang fa gotwe "monna ke selepe, o a adimanwa?"

English.text: What is the meaning behind the saying "a man is an axe, he is shared?"

Tswana.text: Thopi e jewa ke morafe ofe mme o ka re ba e apaya jang?

English.text: Which tribe eats sorghum cooked in pumpkin juice and how do they cook it?

Tswana.text: Ka 2022 o ne o tlhoka eng gore o tlolele molelwane kafa Namibia mme seo se ile sa fetoga leng, ka mabaka afe?

English.text: What did you need to cross the border into Namibia in 2022, and when and why did that change?

Tswana.text: Roy Sesana ke mang mme ke eng fa a ne a sekisa goromente?

English.text: Who was Roy sesana and why did he take the government to court?

Tswana.text: Mokoto ke eng, o apewa jang le gone o apewa ke bomang e bile gantsi o apeelwa ko kae?

English.text: What is mokoto, how is it prepared, who prepares it and where is it usually prepared?

Tswana.text: Lekgotla la kabo ditsha la re tsamaiso ya lone ya go fetisetsa setsha ko go yo mongwe/ba bangwe ke eng?

English.text: What is the Land Board's procedure for transferring land between two or more parties?

Tswana.text: Ke eng kgomo e e tlhabiwang mo lenyalong goora mosadi e tshwanetse go nna namagadi?

English.text: Why is a cow which is slaughtered during wedding celebrations at the bride's place supposed to be a female?

Tswana.text: Ke ka go reng fa ngwana a tlhokafetse mo lapeng batsadi ba gagwe le bo monnawe ba bo ba beolwa?

English.text: Why are parents and their younger children shaved after the death of their elderly child?

Tswana.text: Ke eng mosadi yo o tlhokafaletsweng ke monna a tshwanelwa ke go patsama kana go ribama mo ntlung go fitlhelela go bolokwa?

English.text: Why is the wife of the deceased supposed to be confined indoors while lying down until the burial is conducted?

Tswana.text: Ke eng batsadi ba  ngwana yo o  nyalwang ba sa letlelelwe go tsenelela moletlo wa kgoroso ya ngwana wa bone?

English.text: Why are the parents of the bride not allowed to attend the wedding celebrations for their daughter at the groom's place?

Tswana.text: Ke eng go bewa lepakwana fa pele ga ntlu ya motsetsi yo o sa tswang go belega?

English.text: What is the significance of the log, that is put at the door step of a recently delivered mother?

Tswana.text: ke eng fa malome  a tshwanelwa ke go fiwa kgomo fa kgaitsadie a nyalwa?

English.text: What is the significance of giving the uncle a cow from a bride price when his sister is getting married?

Tswana.text: Serobe  se apewa jang?

English.text: How do you prepare Serobe dish?

Tswana.text: Ke eng mosadi yo o sa nyalwang a sa tshwanelwa ke go neelwa magadi fa ngwana wa gagwe a nyalwa?

English.text: Why a woman who is not married,is not given bride price when her daughter get married?

Tswana.text: Ke mabaka afe  a puso ya Mmamosadinyana e ne e a neela gore e ka se neele lefatshe la Botswana tshireletso mo maburung a ko Aforika borwa, morago  ga go re dikgosi di kope tshireletso?

English.text: What were the reasons given by British government for not giving Botswana protection from South Africa after several requests were made?

Tswana.text: Ke eng morago ga go bolaya kgomo mo lenyalong malome a neelwa tlhogo?

English.text: Whyu is the uncle given the head of a slaaughtered cow after his nieces wedding?

Tswana.text: Ke ka go reng dikgomo tsa magadi di tshwanetse go nna namagadi gape palo ya tsone e sa tlhotse?

English.text: Why are the cows paid as bride price supposed to be even(not odd) in number and females?

Tswana.text: Ke eng ngwana a sa tshwanelwa ke go tlhabelwa ke letsatsi a sa ntse a robetse?

English.text: What is the reason for not allowing children especially the boy child not to wake up after the sun set?

Tswana.text: Ke eng mosadi o tlhokafaletsweng ke monna  a sa tshwanelwa ke go tsena mo lesakeng la dikgomo kgotsa dipudi pele ga a gatisiwa motshotelo kana boloko?

English.text: Why is the wife of a deceased husband not allowed to access a kraal of any livestock before she steps on cow dung?

Tswana.text: Ke eng mosadi a tshwanela ke go huralela lebitla fa a latlhela mmu wa bofelo fa go bolokwa monna wa gagwe?

English.text: Why a woman of a deceased husband is supposed to pay her last respect by sprinkling the soil while staring at the opposite side of the grave?

Tswana.text: Ke ka go reng ere fa ngwetsi  a goroswa goora monna,masika a monna a letsa megolokwane,ba dira o kare ba apaya le go feela le gone go ala diphate gore ngwetsi a tsamaye fa godimo ga tsone go fitlhelela a nna fatshe?

English.text: Why during the arrival of the bride at the groom's place,do the groom's relatives have to ululate,imitate doing chores like cooking and sweeping,and finally lay a mat on the ground for the bride to walk on until settling down?

Tswana.text: Lefatshe la Botswana le ne le reng mabapi le kgotlhang gare ga Botswana le Namibia ka kgang ya Sedudu le gore ene ya rarabololwa jang?

English.text: What reasons did Botswana provide to support its claim to Sedudu Island during the conflict with Namibia, and how was the dispute resolved?

Tswana.text: Teemane ya Botswana e fetotse itsholelo ya Botswana ka tsela e fe?

English.text: How did the diamond industry in Botswana contribute to the economy of the country?

Tswana.text: Ke eng se se bakileng gore palo ya Batswana mo Botswana e nne palo e ko tlase mme morafe wa Botswana o le montsi ko Aforika Borwa?

English.text: What led to a smaller population of Batswana in our country than the native Tswana speakers found in South Africa?

Tswana.text: Ke dife ditlamorago,tse di neng tsa tsisiwa ke kgotlhang ya tautona wa ntlha morago ga go supa fa ana le maikaelelo a go nyala motho mosweu gotswa ko ga Mmamosadinyana fa gare ga ga rraagwe(kgosi) le morafe?

English.text: What consequences were brought by the conflict resulting from the first president of Botswana's proposal to marry a woman from Britain?

Tswana.text: Ke eng se se bakileng gore merafe e e farologaneng e tshabelelwe  ke go tsamaela thata ko bokone ja Botswana go tswa ko borwa?

English.text: What economic factor led to the migration of different Batswana tribes from the southern to the northern region?

Tswana.text: Ke mabaka afe a  dirileng gore dikgosi tse tharo gotswa mo merafeng e e farologaneng, di kope go sirelediwa ke puso ya Mmamosadinyana?

English.text: What reasons did three chiefs from different ethnic tribes present to request a protectorate status from the British Government?

Tswana.text: Ke kgotlhang efe ya sepolotiki e e neng ya dira gore morafe wa Batawana o kgaogane le wa Bangwato,mme Batawana ba tsamaela ko bokone bophirima ja Botswana?

English.text: What political conflict led to the separation of the Batawana and Bangwato tribes, causing the Batawana to migrate to the northwest of Botswana?

Tswana.text: Seporo se se tswang south to north se ne se agelwa eng mo Botswana?

English.text: What were the reasons for construction of south to north railway line in Botswana?

Tswana.text: Ke mabaka afe a a dirileng gore toropo kgolo e fuduge go tswa ko Mafikeng(Aforika Borwa) go ya ko Gaborone?

English.text: What were the reasons for relocation of the city of Botswana from Mafikeng(South Africa) to Gaborone?

Tswana.text: Tebelo pele ya Botswana ya 2036 ,e solofetsa eng mabapi le tsa thuto le tsa botsogo?

English.text: What are the expectations on health and education system of Botswana from vision 2036?

Tswana.text: Ke eng fa mosadi yo nyetsweng a tshwanetse go apara tjale?

English.text: Why should a married woman wear a "tjale"?

Tswana.text: Bogwera ke eng mme bo dirwa jang?

English.text: What is "bogwera" and how is it done?

Tswana.text: Bojale ke eng mme bo dirwa jang?

English.text: What is "bojale" and how is it done?

Tswana.text: Bojalwa jwa setswana bo apewa jang?

English.text: How do you make traditional beer?

Tswana.text: Nku ya mokwele e ntshiwa ka mabaka afe?

English.text: Why is "nku ya mokwele" given away?

Tswana.text: Ke eng se se dirang gore Kasane e nne lefelo la bojanala?

English.text: What makes Kasane a tourist attraction?

Tswana.text: Kgotlhang ya polototiki fa gare ga ga Tautona Masisi le Tautona yo o fetileng Ian Khama e bakwa ke eng?

English.text: What political factors are causing the misunderstanding between the current president Masisi and his predecessor Ian Khama?

Tswana.text: Bakwena ba bina eng mme ke dingwao dife tse di dikologileng sereto?

English.text: What is the totem of the Bakwena tribe and what are the customs surrounding a totem?

Tswana.text: Go ya ka ngwao, mosetsana o ne a dira jang fa a bona setswalo sa gagwe sa ntlha mme seo se farologana jang le se se diragalang gompieno?

English.text: According to cultural tradions, what was a girl supposed to do when she got her first period and how is that different from how things are done today?

Tswana.text: Batlokwa ba fitlhela baswi ba bone kae mme ke eng ba dira jalo?

English.text: Where do the Batlokwa bury their dead and why?

Tswana.text: Tsamaiso ya go ikopela setsha ko lephateng la Kabo Ditsha ke efe?

English.text: What is the process of applying for a plot at the Land Board?

Tswana.text: O tswanetse go sala tsamaiso efe morago fa o latlhile Omang?

English.text: What process should you follow when you have lost your Omang?

Tswana.text: Umbrella for Democratic Change (UDC) ke eng, e eteletswe pele ke mang mme e nale diparty tse kafe mo go yone?

English.text: What is Umbrella for Democratic Change (UDC), who is its leader and how many parties fall under it?

Tswana.text: Modimo wa Bakalaka ke ene mang, o obamelelwa kae mme go dumelwa gore ke ene a tsisang eng?

English.text: What is the name of the Kalanga god, where is he worshipped and what is he believed to bring?

Tswana.text: Tshekedi Khama ke mang mme o nnile le seabe sefe mo go reng Botswana e bo e le lefatshe le le ikemetseng ka nosi?

English.text: Who is Tshekedi Khama and what role did he play in Botswana becoming independent?

Tswana.text: Ke eng fa Lentswe la Baratani ko Otse le bidiwa jalo?

English.text: Why is Otse Hill called "Lentswe la Baratani?"

Tswana.text: Ke eng se se neng se le pharologano ka lenyalo la ga Sir Seretse Khama le Ruth Khama mme Ruth Khama o ne a itshwara jang lefa go nale pharologanyo eo?

English.text: What was different about Sir Seretse Khama and Ruth Khama's marriage and how did Ruth Khama behave despite the difference?

Tswana.text: Leinane la Sananapo la reng?

English.text: What Sananapo's story about?

Tswana.text: Phane e omisiwa jang?

English.text: How do you dry mophane worms?

Tswana.text: Metse ya Jwaneng le Letlhakane la Orapa e itsege ka eng mme e thusa Batswana jang?

English.text: What are Jwaneng and Letlhakane/Orapa known for and how do they help Batswana?

Tswana.text: O ka tlhalosa jang se se tumisitseng phuti mo hisitoring ya rona?

English.text: Why the "duiker" is prominent in our history?

Tswana.text: Kgang ya sepoko sa Mmashia ke ya eng?

English.text: What is the story behind "sepoko sa Mmamashia?"

Tswana.text: Madila a dirwa jang?

English.text: How do you make 'madila?'

Tswana.text: Dikgosi tse tharo tse di neng di ile ko Britain ka ngwaga wa 1895 ke bomang mme o ka tlhalosa jang se di neng di ile go se dira koo?

English.text: Who are the three chiefs who went to Britain in 1895 and what did they do there?

Tswana.text: Mollo wa kgolagano o ne o tsamaisiwa ka ngwaga ofe, jang, ka mabaka afe?

English.text: Which year was "the fire of the covenant" moved around the country? How was it moved and why was it moved?
